text: tatha ye (quraan) ek pustak hai, jise hamane (tauraat ke samaan) utaara hai. jo shubh tatha apane se poorv (kee pustakon) ko sach bataane vaalee hai, taaki aap "ummul qura" (makka nagar) tatha usake chaturdik ke nivaasiyon ko sachet[1] karen tatha jo paralok ke prati vishvaas rakhate hain, vahee isapar eemaan laate hain aur vahee apanee namaazon ka paalan karate[2] hain
